overview: SHOWTIME Sportsâ€™ new podcast ALL THE SMOKE WITH MATT BARNES AND STEPHEN JACKSON features an in-depth sit-down interview with the late NBA legend Kobe Bryant at his office in Southern California. In what was to be one of his final sit-down interviews, Bryant opens up about his life after retirement from basketball, fatherhood and the biggest misconceptions about him.
title: ATS with Kobe Bryant
